rules.label: Not Blank Linked Deal Bid Registration

decisions.description: Description: This workflow rule will send an email alert to the account owner anytime an opportunity is created under one of the TESCO MCN's. Rule Criteria: Account: Master Customer NumberEQUALS 98921462,1010287A2,6880177,74591GB,75150GB,7034683,71974GB,134371GB,9950350
decisions.name: notify_TESCO_account_owner_of_CTS
decisions.label: notify TESCO account owner of CTS

rules.name: Condition_Met2
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 10
rules.label: Condition Met

decisions.description: EBA_SF-1254 - Notify Payments Specialist when they are added to an opportunity
decisions.name: Opp_Notify_Payments_Rep1
decisions.label: Opp_Notify_Payments_Rep

rules.name: Notify_Payment_Rep
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6 AND 7)) AND 2 AND 3
rules.label: Notify Payment Rep

decisions.description: As part of story EBA_SF-2284. We are sending notification that we ready to have a Solutions Consultant scheduled when the selling stage changes to validating on an opportunity.
decisions.name: Opportunity_selling_stg_chg_to_validating
decisions.label: Opp selling stg chg to validating

rules.name: Selling_Stage_Validating
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ((3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6)) AND 7
rules.label: Selling Stage Validating

decisions.description: Description: This workflow is part of the Salespath Component. Rule Criteria: Opportunity: bypass validation EQUALS True
decisions.name: Reset_bypass_validation
decisions.label: Reset bypass validation

decisions.description: Rule Criteria (Opportunity: Opportunity Record TypeEQUALSIndirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Include in Funnel) AND (Opportunity: StageEQUALSClosed/Booked) AND (Opportunity: TypeEQUALSNew Customer) AND (Opportunity: Owner RoleCONTAINSFIN-NAMER)
decisions.name: Send_email_to_Chad_Bruhn_when_new_customer_opportunity_is_Closed_Booked
decisions.label: Send email to Chad Bruhn when new customer opportunity is Closed/Booked

decisions.description: Description : Send email to DI CAs when an opportunity is placed in the Closed/Booked status Rule Criteria (Account: Subscription GroupEQUALSDigital Insight,Digital Insight- Billing Hold) AND (Opportunity: StageEQUALSClosed/Booked)
decisions.name: Send_email_to_DI_CAs
decisions.label: Send email to DI CAs

decisions.description: Rule Criteria: (Opportunity: Opportunity Record TypeEQUALSIndirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Include in Funnel,Indirect - Exclude from Funnel,Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Exclude from Funnel,Include in Funnel) AND (Opportunity: StageEQUALSClosed/Booked,Closed/Lost) AND (Opportunity: Owner RoleCONTAINSFIN-NAMER-CFI-MIDWEST)
decisions.name: Send_email_to_John_Morgan_when_an_opportunity_is_Closed
decisions.label: Send email to John Morgan when an opportunity is Closed

rules.name: Condition_Met5
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND ( 8 OR 10 ) AND 9
rules.label: Condition Met

decisions.description: Send email to Mariana Miranda when Banking opportunity is Closed/Booked
decisions.name: Send_email_to_Mariana_Miranda
decisions.label: Send email to Mariana Miranda

decisions.description: Rule Criteria ((Opportunity: Opportunity Record TypeEQUALSIndirect - Exclude from Funnel,Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Exclude from Funnel,Include in Funnel) AND (Opportunity: StageEQUALSClosed/Booked - NonFunnel,Closed/Booked)) AND((Current User: Manager Level 01CONTAINSBenjamin Seelos,Brian Pilla,Mark Leinenkugel,John Morgan,Bo Watson,Robert Malik) OR (Current User: Manager Level 02EQUALSron furnier))
decisions.name: Send_email_to_Ron_Furnier_when_an_opportunity_is_Closed
decisions.label: Send email to Ron Furnier when an opportunity is Closed

rules.name: Condition_Met7
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND ( 6 OR 7 ) AND (8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 )
rules.label: Condition Met

decisions.description: Description: When the Sales Program value = Hospitality Cross-Selling, trigger an email notification to opportunity creator. Rule Criteria: Opportunity: Sales ProgramEQUALSHospitality Cross-Selling
decisions.name: When_the_Sales_Program_value_Hospitality_Cross_Selling
decisions.label: When the Sales Program value = Hospitality Cross-Selling

Flow.description: Last workflow migrated to this flow - Opp_Notify_Payments_Rep Last Modification done for - EBA_SF-2284 This was version V7. V7 deleted for story EBA_SF- 2472

formulas.name: Track_Oppty_Close_Date
formulas.expression: AND ( ($Profile.Name <> "02 NSC Administrator"), ($Profile.Name <> "C9 Administration"), ($Profile.Name <> "iPaas Administration"), OR( ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.StageName}, 'Closed/Booked'), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.StageName}, 'Closed/Lost'), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.StageName}, 'Closed/Discontinued'), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.StageName}, 'Closed/Booked - NonFunnel')) , ({!$Record.Prevent_Account_Change_Retrigger__c}= false))

Flow.label: Opportunity After Update Flow

subflows.description: JP related emails are triggered by using this flow
subflows.name: Opportunity_JP_flow_call
subflows.label: Opportunity JP flow call
